title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVI, pt. 752 - Rules And Regulations Governing Leases, Licenses, Concession Agreements And Other Agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVI, pt. 752 - Rules And Regulations Governing Leases, Licenses, Concession Agreements And Other Agreements

State Regulations
§ 752.1 - Applicability
§ 752.2 - Maximum lease term
§ 752.3 - Leases in excess of 10 years
§ 752.4 - Leases requiring total capital investments in excess of $1,000,000
§ 752.5 - Rental policy governing leases, licenses, concession agreements or other agreements
§ 752.6 - Appropriation of monies from leases, licenses, concession agreements or other agreements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVI, pt. 752

Statutory authority: L. 1998, ch. 592

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
